alert.note: Alert for Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tyler County through 545 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colmesneil, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Colmesneil, Chester, and Rockland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
